title: S-Duality in N=4 Yang-Mills Theories
abstract: Evidence in favor of $SL(2,Z)$ S-duality in $N=4$ supersymmetric Yang-Mills theories in four dimensions and with general compact, simple gauge groups is presented. (Contribution to the Proceedings of the Strings '95 conference, March 13-18, 1995, USC, and the Proceedings of the Trieste Conference on S-Duality and Mirror Symmetry, June 5-9, 1995.)
